name: tool_save_fact_to_memory
description:
SUMMARY: Saves a single fact to the Vertex AI Agent Engine Memory Bank using the CreateMemory operation.

LOGIC:
1. The tool receives the fact text and metadata (URL, User ID, Domain ID).
2. Constructs the `scope` object, storing `source_url` and `user_id` for context.
3. Maps `domain_id` to the target topic in the Memory Bank.
4. Initiates a call to ADK / VertexAiMemoryBankService using the `CreateMemory` method (strictly creation, not generation).
5. Returns the ID of the created record upon success.

RETURN VALUE:
Returns a JSON object in the format: { "status": "success", "data": { "memory_id": "string" }, "error": null }

ERRORS:
- "CONNECTION_FAILED": Failed to establish connection with Vertex AI ADK.
- "TOPIC_NOT_FOUND": The specified `domain_id` was not found in the Memory Bank configuration.
- "INVALID_PAYLOAD": Missing required field (fact text or scope).
- "WRITE_ERROR": Internal error writing to memory storage.

fact_text.description: Text content of the fact to be saved to memory.

source_url.description: Source URL from where the fact was derived. Saved in the scope field.

user_id.description: Unique user identifier. Saved in the scope field.

domain_id.description: Knowledge domain identifier. Corresponds to the topic parameter in Memory Bank.
